item.title: KPIT Tech Shares: Technicals Hint At Recovery Potential But It Needs To Break Above This Level, Says SEBI Analyst
item.description: Summary: Analyst highlighted a bullish RSI divergence and a breakout setup as rationale behind the outlook.

item.title: Nifty Ends Below 24,800 As Tariff Shock Weighs On Sentiment; Pharma, Textiles & Autos Take A Knock
item.description: Only FMCG and media bucked the trend. Analyst expects near-term consolidation between 24,660 and 24,890 before the next directional cue.

item.title: PNB Stock In Tight Range After Q1 Earnings: SEBI Analyst Sees Bullish Bias If ₹101 Holds
item.description: Q1 earnings showed asset quality improvement and stable margins. The analyst advised caution till a breakout above ₹111.

item.title: India's $40 Billion US Export Market Under Cloud: SEBI Analysts Suggest Sectoral Shift, Focus On Safer Domestic Plays
item.description: India’s key exports to the US include petroleum products, gems and jewellery, textiles, garments, pharmaceuticals, electronics, and chemicals

item.title: Shell CEO Rules Out BP Deal Again After Pledging $3.5B For Buybacks: ‘I Don’t Buy Bigger Is Better’
item.description: Wael Sawan said that the company is focused on repurchasing Shell shares at an attractive yield for the foreseeable future.
